import React from "react"; import author from "../me.jpg"; import { Link } from "react-scroll"; const AboutMe = () => { return (

About...!

I have been working with Shopify for over 3 years. I have created Shopify themes from scratch based on your specific design and requirements. This includes but is not limited to styling, custom functionality, special features, and integrating 3rd party applications.

I also work on ReactJs and make shopify apps based on NodeJs. If you have some specific requirements about designing your app or custom store front using shopify store front API, I am here to help you.

With my development, designing, and programming skills. You will get a cost-effective development process driven by agile methodologies.

I offer on-time delivery, quality tech stack and trendy visual taste. I am your one-stop solution. Contact me now, and let's  discuss {" "} your project.

Cheers!

); }; export default AboutMe;
